lead_paragraph: Rutgers has given Coach Fred Hill a two-year contract extension, but he did not receive a salary increase under the deal, which will run through the 2012-13 season. Hill, 48, received a five-year contract worth $500,000 per year when he succeeded Gary Waters in 2006. The Scarlet Knights were 11-20 last season, including 3-15 in the Big East.
